basic.floral_language:
Lobivia arachnacantha 
Floriography: strong, kind, persistent.
Succulent stem of the Lobivia arachnacantha is oval and palm shaped, thick and juicy. Leaves reduce to long needle spines. Because it is almost care free, Lobivia arachnacantha is very popular and could be found on desktop, tea table, bedroom and office.
Lobivia arachnacantha requires direct bright sunlight for growth. It blooms in certain conditions. Flower color could be light yellow, orange or pink.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers with a short period flowering time 2-3 days

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, put in sunny places, shade properly under summer strong light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce watering in winter dormancy
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply once monthly in spring to autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
